title: Update von Firefox nicht möglich - Gesicherte Verbindung fehlgeschlagen
content:
Hallo zusammen,

es ist seit kurzem nicht mehr möglich, Updates vom Firefox zu installieren. Ich kann noch nicht einmal über Mozilla.org den aktuellen Firefox herunterladen, da beim letzten Schritt (Beim Aufrufen dieses Links: https://download-installer.cdn.mozilla.net/pub/firefox/releases/87.0/win32/en-US/Firefox%20Installer.exe) die gesicherte Verbindung fehlgeschlagen ist... Ich habe in den Internet-Optionen jede einzelne TLS und SSL Version aktiv, trotzdem ändert sich nichts daran. Hat jemand einen Lösungsansatz dazu?

Danke!
creator: quarks3238

title: Gmail, pegando imágenes en el redactor
content:
Hola,

Al escribir email en gmail, al pegar imagenes ("copy+paste" o "ctrl+c + ctrl+v") me pega la imagen dos veces en el mensaje, esto no me ocurre si pego texto, únicamente con imágenes y solo en Firefox desde hace dos días.

He borrado los cookies y reinicado firefox e incluso el PC, pero me sigue pasando. Tengo windows 7 Pro.

¿Deberia de preocuparme por si tengo algún malware? Tengo Microsoft Security Essentials actualizado y he escaneado el equipo sin cosas sospechosas.

Mil gracias.
creator: hollymtb

title: Backspace keyboard button not working in Firefox 87
content:
Hello,

I just upgraded to Firefox 87 and noticed that I wasn't able to go back to the previous webpage by clicking on the backspace button like what I have done in the past if I'm not using a mouse on my laptop and had to click on the back button in the toolbar with the trackpad. I'm not too sure of why that happened with the upgrade and was a little surprised about that. Hope I can be able to get around this in some way if one of you know anything about this. Thanks.
creator: Anduma22

title: Firefox 87.0 Win10 X64
content: Function of backspace key: As me many people prefere to use the backspace key to move one page back when browsing a website (navigating with the keyboard is more healthy than using the mouse all the time). After updating to version 87.0 this does not work any longer. Is there any way to get this functionality back?
creator: dc6mb

title: Firefox Crashed and I lost saved logins
content:
My firefox crashed and my pc restarted. Now my firefox broiwser seems to have updated (version 87.0 64 Bit Wiondows10) but all bookmarks, saved login were lost in the process.

I managed to restore the bookmarks by finding my old bookmark files via %APPDATA%\Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles\

I also found the old files - logins.json and key4.db files. But how do i restore them?

I basically want to restore all my lost login details. please help !!
creator: shameera.amry

title: Pocket disappeared from the "library" menu in FF 87. How to view my saved items?
content:
Someone already reported it there: https://www.reddit.com/r/firefox/comments/mc8vyx/pocket_disappeared_from_the_library_dropdown/

There is currently no way to view websites saved to pocket. Only integration is that one button visible on address bar and I have no idea how to restore it after you remove it. I hate their clumsiness. This is second time they remove one thing and forget to add replacement/config in time. Previous case was something with bookmarks menu if I remember correctly, and they still did not add any option to right-click-menu.
creator: Piterk

title: Printing stopped working (Epson)
content:
I can't print from Firefox to printer anymore. Printing to PDF then use PDF viewer to printer works fine though.

After attempt to print browser shows no error, but nothing gets printed and cups shows

> EPSON_WP-4525_usb-791 Unknown Withheld 19k Unknown "Filter failed"

I see this in cups logs:

> $ journalctl -u cups -e > ... > cupsd[326540]: PID 328154 (/opt/epson-inkjet-printer-201113w/cups/lib/filter/epson_inkjet_printer_filter) stopped with status 127 (File too large) > ...

In the past this has worked for me but I'm not sure when exactly it stopped working. I'm not printing very often and usually print from other programs as Firefox often messes-up the pages. Other browsers print usually better but I guess this is for another topic.

- Fedora 32, Firefox 86.0 (64-bit)
creator: akostadinov

title: Certificates P12
content: Hi, for work I have to use a site that requires a certificate .P12 for access. I work on MacBook. Since the last update, 87.0 release in 03/23, the site keeps throwing me out after I log in. Does anyone have any idea how to fix this or will this be fixed in a future update? Thank You.
creator: carlo.deboni

title: Get sessionid of cookie in Web Console
content:
In the "Cookies" Storage Type in Storage Inspector (Shift+F9):

Name Value ... ... csrftoken AB...c sessionid XY...z ... ...

However, in Web Console (Ctrl+Shift+K), if I execute console.log(document.cookie), the only thing I get is "csrftoken=AB...c". "sessionid=XY...z" is missing.

How can I get the sessionid of the cookie in Web Console?

Linux ... 5.11.7-arch1-1 #1 SMP PREEMPT ... x86_64 GNU/Linux

Archlinux

Firefox 87.0
creator: Un1Gfn

title: Is this CISCO OpenH264 plugin a virus?
content:
https://filebin.net/zl68sj1fihfne46x https://file.io/FO6oQCShwyeC

For many years, My firefox locks when I have many tabs.

I always auto-update firefox 64bit windows standard korean version.

I today found locking is because of CISCO OpenH264 plugin.

It is updated from CISCO server, not from firefox server.

C:\Users\"omitted"\AppData\Roaming\Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles\234iz1u5.default-release\gmp-gmpopenh264\1.8.1.1\gmpopenh264.dll

SHA-256 is "1ED7877024BE63A049DA98733FD282C16BD620530A4FB580DACEC3A78ACE914E"
creator: aaidee

title: Как отключить сообщение Прокси «moz-proxy
content: In the proxy settings, it is disabled, but when it starts, a window pops up asking for proxy authorization. How to disable?
creator: cadabra.abra

title: Programmable Serch Engine
content:
Últimamente se me ha presentado una situación a la hora de usar Firefox. El motor de búsqueda que yo ocupo es Google, hasta ahí todo bien. Yo puedo estar de lo más normal usando Firefox haciendo mis búsquedas, pero en algunas ocasiones se cambia todo el formato de Google y la pestaña en vez de mostrarme el texto de lo que yo había buscado, por ejemplo, "Firefox - Búsqueda con Google", me pone "Programmable Serch Engine" y me busca como si fuera un formato algo antiguo de Google (adjunto imagen), no me agrega imágenes o referencias visuales a mis búsquedas y me pone muchos anuncios. Es algo molesto estar trabajando con esto y ya busqué en toda la configuración de Firefox si hay alguna forma para que deje de buscar con el Programmable Serch Engine y que haga mis búsquedas de manera normal, pero no encontré nada relacionado con el tema.

Si alguien me podría ayudar con eso, se lo agradecería mucho.
creator: valentingreco

title: Submit feedback within Firefox still not function
content:
The option in the Help menu for "submit feedback" is still present on version 87 but is no longer functional and has been out of service for 3 months.

creator: mace2

title: Security Breach of Passwords & email/usernames ?
content:
I am a Senior Visison Disabled Veteran. I have used various Firefox Browsers over the past few years on many different devices.

I have used the same firefox account and password and username/email during that time.

My background was in electronics, E.E., Sci, etc. When I was in the Mil-Intel-Indust complex I came to know all electronic systems starting in the 1950's where backdoored. So I have tried to be carefull when setting up and using Firefox browsers. I thought I had delebritly set it up to NOT RECORD any email, username, or password EVER ! To prevent my info from leaking out.

Today I downloaded a free copy of NordPass from their main website. Part of the set up is an option to import from other browsers, etc all emails/usernames and passwords to store them in one location under one password in NordPass.

When I seclected the "Secure Notes" for firefox I got a BIG SUPPRIZE ! There were 11 entries. Yes there was my bank account password and username my firefox account password and username my google account password and username etc and two entries I am in the proccess of trying to locate and find out who they are ! just two urls and usernames and passwords that I never did create or visit thoses urls.

I am requesting your help in deleting this info from my account and keeping all my book marks intact.

I am also interested in preventing this from ever happening again.

Any ideas ?

William okillydokilly@tutanota.com
creator: okillydokilly

title: BOOKMARKS TOOLBAR IS BLANK. HAVE DONE EVERYTHING HELP DOCUMENTS INSTRUCTED.  STILL NO BOOKMARKS.
content: The bookmarks toolbar isn't showing any bookmarks. I searched for help documents and did everything I was instructed to do but the icons are still not showing. If I attempt to right click the toolbar, it doesn't recognize and doesn't give me a pop up menu to choose from. I'm baffled.
creator: keoatalig

title: I'm trying to re-enable 2FA but now Firefox won't accept any of the generated codes
content:
I'm in the middle of migrating 2FA from Google Authenticator to Authy. Naturally that would involve disabling and reenabling the 2FA setting in my Firefox account. However after scanning the QR code, the Firefox setting keeps refusing ALL the codes generated by Authy. Entering the key manually in Authy also still producing the same error ("Incorrect two-step authentication code").

I have tried searching the help articles here and browsing similar questions by other users but still could not find any working solution (going back to Google Authenticator is not the kind of solution I'm looking for). It seems the problem is with Firefox as the Authy codes never had any problem with other 2FA logins. I hope it's not something like "Firefox does not support Authy". No thanks to that now I'm left with unprotected account.
creator: halfey

title: Security issues on the google site
content: I enter the google web address and firefox warns me that the website is not safe. I find it strange, because it's not a little known site.
